title: Mac OS: libuv fails to build without full Xcode
body:
/cc @alexcrichton 

On a fresh Mac OS X 10.9.2, with the Xcode command line tools installed (but not full Xcode), I get the following:

```
> make x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv.a
cfg: build triple x86_64-apple-darwin
cfg: host triples x86_64-apple-darwin
cfg: target triples x86_64-apple-darwin
cfg: enabling more debugging (CFG_ENABLE_DEBUG)
cfg: host for x86_64-apple-darwin is x86_64
cfg: os for x86_64-apple-darwin is apple-darwin
cfg: using clang
cfg: no pdflatex found, deferring to xelatex
cfg: no xelatex found, deferring to lualatex
cfg: no lualatex found, disabling LaTeX docs
cfg: no pandoc found, omitting PDF and EPUB docs
cfg: no llnextgen found, omitting grammar-verification
touch x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv/libuv-auto-clean-stamp
(cd /Users/aturon/moz/rust/src/libuv/ && /usr/bin/python2.7 ./gyp_uv.py -f make -Dtarget_arch=x64 -D ninja -DOS=mac -Goutput_dir=/Users/aturon/moz/rust/x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv --generator-output /Users/aturon/moz/rust/x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv)
['-f', 'make', '-Dtarget_arch=x64', '-D', 'ninja', '-DOS=mac', '-Goutput_dir=/Users/aturon/moz/rust/x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv', '--generator-output', '/Users/aturon/moz/rust/x86_64-apple-darwin/rt/libuv', '/Users/aturon/moz/rust/src/libuv/uv.gyp', '-I', '/Users/aturon/moz/rust/src/libuv/common.gypi', '--depth=.', '-Dgcc_version=42', '-Dclang=1', '-Dhost_arch=x64', '-Duv_library=static_library', '-Dcomponent=static_library']
xcode-select: error: tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode, but active developer directory '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' is a command line tools instance

xcode-select: error: tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode, but active developer directory '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' is a command line tools instance
```
